short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to blackout your screen at set intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breaktime Blackout is a productivity-focused Chrome extension designed to help you take regular breaks while working or studying. The extension automatically blacks out your screen at set intervals, reminding you to step away and recharge. Customize your work and break schedule to fit your needs, ensuring you maintain focus and avoid burnout.
